name: Rhodeia of Loch
title: "Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia
desc: "As long as rain falls and rivers flow... water will exist forever... "

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Rhodeia of Loch

skills.name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
skills.desc: Randomly summons 1 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).

skills.name: The Myriad Wilds
skills.desc: Randomly summons 2 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).

skills.name: Tide and Torrent
skills.desc: Deals 4 Hydro DMG. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +1 additional DMG.

skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Hydro
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Elemental Lifeform: Hydro.
